price: ߝߋ߲߫ ߝߐ ߊߟߎ߫ ߓߟߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߕߍ߰ߒ߬ߛߏ߬ߦߊ߬ߓߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߓߘߊ
arabic: كَبُرَ مَقۡتًا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَن تَقُولُواْ مَا لَا تَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: kabura maqtan ʿinda al-lahi an taqūlū mā lā tafʿalūna
